He became one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea during the timeskip, but his position was revoked for allying with the Straw Hat Pirates. Like many other pirates, Law has dreams of finding the One Piece, while also desiring to know the purpose of the Will of D. Law is the only known survivor of Flevance, a town whose inhabitants suffered from a condition known as Amber Lead Syndrome. Because the disease was fatal and poorly understood, Flevance was destroyed by neighboring countries out of fear (including Law's parents and younger sister), with a young Law barely escaping alive. He subsequently joined the Donquixote Pirates, where Donquixote Doflamingo intended to make Law one of his executive officers. However, thanks to the efforts of Doflamingo's brother, Rosinante, Law was freed from the Donquixote Pirates' influence and became a pirate set to bring down Doflamingo's empire. As part of his plan, he allied himself with Monkey D. Luffy, and together they not only defeated Doflamingo, but also two of the Four Emperors. During the timeskip, his bounty increased from 200,000,000 to 440,000,000 before it was frozen due to his induction into the Seven Warlords of the Sea. However, after having his title revoked during the events of the Dressrosa Arc, Law's bounty was reinstated and raised to 500,000,000. Eventually, his bounty would be raised to 3,000,000,000 for his role in taking down Big Mom of the Four Emperors alongside Eustass Kid during the Wano Country Arc. Law joins forces with the Straw Hat Pirates for a brief moment during the Sabaody Archipelago Arc and later on saves Luffy's life at the very end of the Marineford Arc. He is one of the central allies of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Dressrosa, Whole Cake Island, and Wano Country Sagas. He also acts as an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the movies One Piece: Stampede and One Piece Film: Red.

characters.name: Kouzuki Momonosuke

devil_fruit.name: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu (Artificial)
devil_fruit.power: Allows him to transform into a serpentine dragon and fly by producing Flame Clouds.

characters.short_bio: Kouzuki Momonosuke is the current shogun of Wano Country. A member of the Kouzuki Family, he is the son of the late daimyo of Kuri Kouzuki Oden and his wife Toki, the grandson of the former shogun Sukiyaki, and the older brother of Hiyori. Momonosuke was born 28 years ago while his parents were sailing with the Whitebeard Pirates. Though rightfully the heir to the shogunate after Oden, the Kouzuki Family was deposed by the Kurozumi Family during Oden's travels, and attempts were made on Momonosuke's life by Kurozumi Orochi's administration. Oden was executed when Momonosuke was 8, and Orochi and Kaidou began waging open warfare to eliminate the Kouzuki bloodline. To keep Momonosuke safe, Toki sent him 20 years forward in time with several of his retainers. Upon reappearing, Momonosuke and his men went out to sea to recruit allies for a planned battle against Orochi and Kaidou. To conceal his identity, Momonosuke pretended to be the son of his retainer Kin'emon. Throughout their voyage, return to Wano, and climactic battle with Kaidou's forces, Momonosuke steadily grew to accept and assume his role as the leader of the Kouzuki Family and their allies. To be of better use during the conflict, Momonosuke had his retainer Shinobu use her Juku Juku ability to age his body 20 years, though he remains a child mentally. The Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance emerged victorious from this war, and Momonosuke attained his rightful position of shogun to unanimous support from the Wano citizens; he would go on to be renowned as one of Wano's greatest leaders. He was first mentioned when Kin'emon told Sanji that he came to Punk Hazard to rescue his "son". His given name was revealed when the samurai was asking if the captive children in the Biscuits Room had seen him, and his clan name was revealed when Kin'emon spoke of his true heritage. He is a major ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the entirety of the Dressrosa and Wano Country Sagas.

characters.name: Lao G
characters.short_bio: Lao G is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army. Due to his actions and role, he is a supporting antagonist during the Dressrosa Arc.

characters.name: Doberman
characters.short_bio: Vice Admiral Doberman is a veteran Marine officer. He was one of the five Vice Admirals who led the Buster Call against Enies Lobby, and also took part in the Summit War of Marineford. Two years later, he is one of the nine Vice Admirals that took part in the Egghead Incident. Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Enies Lobby and Marineford Arcs, and a supporting antagonist in the Egghead Arc.

characters.name: Hatcha
characters.short_bio: Hatcha is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "eight". Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Pierre

devil_fruit.name: Uma Uma no Mi
devil_fruit.power: Allows him to turn into a full horse (Pegasus form)

characters.short_bio: Pierre is a Sky Dot Bird belonging to Gan Fall.

characters.name: Dosun
characters.short_bio: Dosun is a hammerhead shark fish-man and was one of the officers of the New Fish-Man Pirates. Due to his actions and role, he is considered to be a major antagonist in the Fish-Man Island Arc.

characters.name: Magellan
characters.short_bio: Magellan is the vice warden of Impel Down. He was formerly the chief warden, but after his failure to stop the jail's one and only mass-breakout, he was replaced by Hannyabal and demoted to vice warden. He is the main antagonist during the Impel Down Arc.

characters.name: Mont Blanc Noland
characters.japanese_name: モンブラン・ノーランド
characters.epithet: "Liar Noland" (うそつきノーランド, Usotsuki Nōrando?)
characters.short_bio: Mont Blanc Noland was an admiral in the Lvneel Kingdom and a famous explorer who made multiple trips into the Grand Line. He discovered a City of Gold on Jaya, but found upon returning there with Lvneel's king that it had disappeared, causing him to be executed. He was then memorialized in a fairy tale as a liar and trickster.

characters.name: Braham
characters.short_bio: Braham is one of the Shandia warriors who fought to take back Upper Yard from Enel.

characters.name: Den
characters.role: Shipwright; Sea Forest Researcher; Coating Mechanic
characters.short_bio: Den is Tom's younger brother. He is a bering wolffish merman. He is also a shipwright and a Sea Forest researcher.

characters.name: Ideo
characters.role: Captain of the Fourth Ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Pirate, Captain; Boxer
characters.short_bio: "Destruction Cannon" Ideo is an XXX-rank boxer and a member of the Longarm Tribe, as well as the captain of the Ideo Pirates and of the fourth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met three other gladiators with whom he would form the then-XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, as well as Monkey D. Luffy, to whom he eventually pledged his loyalty. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc, and one of the central characters from The Stories of the Self-Proclaimed Straw Hat Grand Fleet Cover Page Serial.

characters.name: Stomp
characters.short_bio: The Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops are a family of seven Super Spot-Billed Ducks (and later one camel) who serve the kingdom of Arabasta. They are led by their captain Karoo, and are reputed to be the fastest troop in the kingdom of Arabasta. All of the ducks have the strange theme of wearing different types of hats and various other jewelry and clothing. Also strange was that the last member to join the squad, Matsuge, is a camel who helped the Straw Hats confront Baroque Works.

characters.name: Inuarashi
characters.epithet: "Duke Inuarashi" (イヌアラシ公爵, Inuarashi Kōshaku?, English versions: "Duke Dogstorm")"Ruler of Day" (昼の王, Hiru no Ō?, Simulcast subs: "King of Day")
characters.role: Daimyo; Ruler of the Mokomo Dukedom (former); Commander of the Musketeers; Retainer; Samurai; Pirate Apprentice (former)
characters.short_bio: Duke Inuarashi is a canine mink. He was one of the two rulers of the Mokomo Dukedom, dubbed the "Ruler of Day", holding the position from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM. He currently serves as the daimyo of Kuri. Inuarashi and Nekomamushi served as retainers for the Kouzuki Family of Wano Country, as members of Kouzuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. The pair also followed Oden as he travelled with the Whitebeard Pirates and Roger Pirates. Pedro has claimed Inuarashi and Nekomamushi must not be allowed to die because "the world is waiting for them". He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Whole Cake Island Saga and the Wano Country Saga.

characters.name: Charlotte Cinnamon
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Cinnamon is the 16th daughter and 37th child of the Charlotte Family, the younger triplet sister of Smoothie and Citron, and a longleg-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Citron
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Citron is the 15th daughter and 36th child of the Charlotte Family, the middle triplet sister of Smoothie and Cinnamon, and a longleg-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Eggs, governing over Kimi Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Smoothie
characters.japanese_name: シャーロット・スムージー
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Smoothie is the 14th daughter and 35th child of the Charlotte Family, the older triplet sister of Citron and Cinnamon, and a longleg-human hybrid. She serves as one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and as Totto Land's Minister of Juice, governing over 100% Island. Due to her actions and role, she is a major antagonist in the Whole Cake Island Arc.

characters.name: Izou
characters.role: 16th Division Commander (former); Samurai; Retainer of the Kouzuki Family
characters.short_bio: Izou was the former 16th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates and prior to this, a retainer of the Wano Country daimyo Kouzuki Oden. He was the older brother of fellow retainer Kikunojo. He was an ally in both the Marineford and Wano Country Arcs, the latter of which he would ultimately lose his life fighting CP0 agent Maha to prevent him from chasing the Straw Hats.

characters.name: Haredas
characters.short_bio: Haredas is an old man who lives in Weatheria. He was Nami's tutor in weather-manipulation during the timeskip.

characters.name: Charlotte Compote
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Compote is the eldest daughter and second child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Fruits, governing over Fruits Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Yuen
characters.japanese_name: シャーロット・ユーエン
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Yuen is the 35th son and 64th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Mornin
characters.short_bio: Mornin is the mayor of Syrup Village, and one of several villagers who used Usopp's antics as a makeshift alarm clock.

characters.name: Taroimo
characters.short_bio: Taroimo is a cyborg dog from Karakuri Island.

characters.name: Marin
characters.short_bio: Marin is a male slave who was forced to dress as a mermaid by his owner.

characters.name: Noble Croc
characters.short_bio: The Noble Croc is a crocodile homie that lives in the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island.

characters.name: Doc Q

devil_fruit.name: Shiku Shiku no Mi
devil_fruit.power: Allows him to afflict others with diseases.

characters.role: Titanic Captain (Captain of the Ninth Ship); Doctor
characters.short_bio: Doc Q, known as "Death God", is the doctor, and one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, serving as the captain of the ninth ship of the fleet. Because of his chronically sick body, he is almost always seen riding his horse, Stronger (who is just as sick as he is), to get around. Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Jaya Arc, a supporting antagonist in the Impel Down and Marineford Arcs, a minor antagonist in the Egghead Arc, and a major antagonist in the Final Saga.

characters.name: Jigoku Benten
characters.short_bio: Jigoku Benten is a kunoichi and a member of the Beasts Pirates. She previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi. Due to her actions and role, she is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Charlotte Anglais
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Anglais is the 42nd son and 78th child of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Galette
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Galette is the 18th daughter and the 42nd child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin sister of Poire. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Butter, governing over Margarine Island. Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist in the Whole Cake Island Arc.

characters.name: Charlotte Poire
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Poire is the 19th daughter and the 43rd child of the Charlotte Family, the younger twin sister of Galette, and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Sea Bunny
characters.short_bio: A sea creature resembling a rabbit discovered near the Red Line by Luffy, Brook, and Robin while traveling in the Shark Submerge III. It had swallowed Camie and Pappag before being defeated by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Rifle.

characters.name: Tyrannosaurus
characters.short_bio: Tyrannosaurus is Iceburg's pet mouse.

characters.name: Sam
characters.short_bio: Sam-san is a drunk man from Cocoyasi Village. On many occasions, he wanders around unknowingly when he is drunk.

characters.name: Vito
characters.short_bio: "Monster Gun" Vito is a member of the Fire Tank Pirates, working as the crew's advisor. He debuts as a supporting antagonist during the Zou Arc. Later, along with his crew, he is a temporary ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Whole Cake Island Arc. He and his crew are also the central characters in "Gang" Bege's Oh My Family Cover Page Serial.

characters.name: Drip
characters.short_bio: Drip was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who was posing as the real Sanji. When the crew switched to posing as the Kid Pirates, Drip impersonated Killer.

characters.name: Sugar
characters.short_bio: Sugar is a special officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army. She was one of the most integral components of Doflamingo's plan in keeping Dressrosa in line, as any dissenters were turned into toys by her Hobi Hobi no Mi powers. She is also the younger sister of Monet. Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist during the Dressrosa Arc.

characters.name: Donquixote Doflamingo
characters.japanese_name: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ
characters.short_bio: Donquixote Doflamingo, nicknamed "Heavenly Yaksha", is the captain of the Donquixote Pirates. Before his imprisonment, he was a member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea with a frozen bounty of 340,000,000, as well as the most influential underworld broker under the codename "Joker". He is also a former World Noble, descended from the Donquixote Family. He is the first son of the late Donquixote Homing and the older brother of the late Rosinante, both of whom he killed out of feeling betrayed by them. Doflamingo became the King of Dressrosa after taking the throne from Riku Doldo III eight years before the start of the series. He ruled the country tyrannically until he was stripped of his positions as a Warlord of the Sea and king after he was defeated by Monkey D. Luffy near the end of the Dressrosa Arc. After Doflamingo was arrested by Admiral Fujitora along with most of his crew, he was locked up at Impel Down and placed in Level 6. Vegapunk later cloned Doflamingo as one of the Seraphim to replace the Warlords. Doflamingo is first introduced during the Skypiea Saga, having a minor role during its epilogue as Bellamy's superior. He is also a major antagonist in the Marineford Arc where he took part in the Summit War of Marineford and sided with the Marines, along with most of the other Warlords of the Sea, and the main antagonist of the Dressrosa Arc and the Dressrosa Saga as a whole, being the impetus for the entirety of the saga's events.

characters.name: Shinobu
characters.epithet: "Bewitching Kunoichi" (悩殺くの一, Nōsatsu Kunoichi?);"Shinobu the Man-Killer" (男殺しのしのぶ, Otoko-goroshi no Shinobu?)
characters.role: Kunoichi; Retainer of the Kouzuki Family; Member of the Kouzuki Family Oniwabanshu (Former)
characters.short_bio: Shinobu is a kunoichi from Wano Country and a retainer of the Kouzuki Family, having once served in the Oniwabanshu of the Kouzuki Shogunate and trained under Kin'emon as his protégée. She is also the younger sister of Shinosuke. She is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: X Drake
characters.role: Captain of SWORD; Pirate (undercover); Captain (undercover); Shinuchi (undercover, former); Marine Rear Admiral (former)
characters.short_bio: "Red Flag" X Drake (pronounced as "Diez Drake") is the captain of the Marine Secret Special Unit SWORD. In order to go undercover as a pirate, he publicly defected from his position as rear admiral and founded the Drake Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates referred to as the "Worst Generation", and before the two-year timeskip had a bounty of 222,000,000. Drake is the son of the Marine-turned-pirate Diez Barrels, and was affiliated with the Barrels Pirates until he defected to the Marines. As a young adult, he was called Dory. In Drake's endeavor as an undercover spy, he and his crew became subordinate to the Beasts Pirates, led by Kaidou of the Four Emperors, over the two-year timeskip. Drake served as one of the crew's Shinuchi, specifically one of strongest six called Tobiroppo. His treachery was eventually uncovered, however, leading him to ally himself with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

characters.name: Koala
characters.role: Revolutionary Army Officer; Assistant Fish-Man Karate Instructor; Slave (former)
characters.short_bio: Koala is a high ranking officer of the Revolutionary Army, serving as the Fish-Man Karate assistant instructor. She started as a slave on Mary Geoise, but was then set free by Fisher Tiger's rampage. She sailed along with the Sun Pirates to reach her home town. Approximately two years later, she left her family to join the Revolutionary Army, where she often works alongside both Sabo and Hack. She first debuted as a child during a flashback in the Fish-Man Island Arc. She made her reappearance during the Dressrosa Arc.

characters.name: Kuroobi
characters.short_bio: Kuroobi is a ray fish-man and an officer of the Arlong Pirates, who was once a member of the Sun Pirates. He is one of the major antagonists of the Arlong Park Arc.

characters.name: Belladonna
characters.short_bio: Belladonna is one of the Kuja of Amazon Lily, and the doctor of the island.

characters.name: Denjiro
characters.epithet: "Dozing Kyoshiro" (居眠り狂死郎, Inemuri Kyōshirō?, VIZ: "Napping Kyoshiro")
characters.role: Daimyo; Samurai; Retainer of the Kouzuki Family (former); Yakuza Boss (former); Money Changer (former); Thief (former)
characters.short_bio: Denjiro is a samurai from Wano Country and one of the Nine Red Scabbards who served as Kouzuki Oden's retainers. He currently serves as the daimyo of Kibi. After becoming grief-stricken over Oden's execution 20 years ago, Denjiro's facial structure changed, and he started going under the name Kyoshiro. With this new identity, he became a yakuza boss and recruited followers to form the Kyoshiro Family. Eventually, he started working for Oden's usurper, shogun Kurozumi Orochi, as his money changer and bodyguard; he would successfully keep his true allegiance to the Kouzuki Family a secret and bide his time until the Scabbards finally reunited to take down Orochi and Kaidou. Apart from his Kyoshiro identity, Denjiro would disguise himself at night to rob the wealthy Flower Capital citizens and give to the poor residents of Ebisu Town, earning him the moniker "Ushimitsu Kozo". He also took care of Oden's daughter Kouzuki Hiyori for the past 13 years, raising her to become the oiran Komurasaki.

characters.name: Kagikko
characters.short_bio: Kagikko is a member of the Krieg Pirates and a locksmith.

characters.name: Scarlet
characters.short_bio: Commander Scarlet is a giant red gorilla, and a high-ranking member of the Golden Lion Pirates. Due to his actions, he is the tertiary antagonist of the tenth One Piece Movie.

characters.name: Charlotte Bavarois
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Bavarois is the 26th son and 45th child of the Charlotte Family, as well as an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He is the younger twin brother of Snack.

characters.name: Charlotte Snack
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Snack is the 25th son and 44th child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin brother of Bavarois. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Fries, governing over Potato Island. He was one of the crew's Four Sweet Commanders until he lost his position when he was defeated by Urouge sometime in the last two years. He was also a member of Charlotte Oven's army to intercept the Straw Hat Pirates on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Turco
characters.short_bio: Turco is a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew and masqueraded as Franky. When the crew switched to posing as the Kid Pirates, Turco impersonated Wire.

characters.name: Domino
characters.short_bio: Domino is the Head Jailer of Impel Down serving under Warden Hannyabal.

characters.name: Magra
characters.short_bio: Magra is a member of the Dadan Family that are active on Mt. Colubo on Dawn Island. He helped take care of Ace and Luffy for Garp.

characters.name: Monster
characters.short_bio: Monster is one of the Senior Officers and musicians of the Red Hair Pirates. He first appeared playing with his crew at the Partys Bar.

characters.name: Whitey Bay
characters.short_bio: "Ice Witch" Whitey Bay is an infamous New World pirate captain who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates before forming her own crew subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Dalmatian
characters.short_bio: Vice Admiral Dalmatian is one of the many Marine vice admirals to have participated in the Summit War of Marineford.

characters.name: Wanda
characters.short_bio: Wanda is a canine mink of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad, previously also acting as a Kingsbird to both Inuarashi and Nekomamushi. She is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Zou and Wano Country Arcs.

characters.name: Judy
characters.short_bio: Judy is Marie's fiancé. He was shot by Charlos when he tried to rescue her.

characters.name: Koncelot
characters.short_bio: Concelot is a fox mink and one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.

characters.name: Marie
characters.short_bio: Marie is the thirteenth wife of Saint Charlos. Before being enslaved by Charlos, she worked as a nurse in the Sabaody Archipelago, and was the fiancée of Judy.

characters.name: Camie
characters.short_bio: Camie is a kissing gourami mermaid that first appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story. She first appeared in the main series after being spat out of a large sea boar that was saved by Hatchan, along with her starfish pet and master, Pappag. While dreaming of becoming a designer, she worked on Hatchan's Takoyaki 8 when she first met the Straw Hat Pirates. After the timeskip, she is a waitress at the Mermaid Cafe on Fish-Man Island. She is a central character during the Sabaody Archipelago Arc and also an ally of the Straw Hats in the Fish-Man Island Arc.

characters.name: Yamato
characters.short_bio: <!-- Yamato's pronouns are he/him as decided by the Wiki community, and listed as "Son of Kaidou" as written in the manga. Editing against this decision may result in a temporary ban. For more information, see the "Gender" section. To view the discussion or discuss when NEW material is released, use the Yamato Talk Page. --> Yamato is the son <!-- Yamato's pronouns are he/him as decided by the Wiki community, and listed as "Son of Kaidou" as written in the manga. Editing against this decision may result in a temporary ban. For more information, see the "Gender" section. To view the discussion or discuss when NEW material is released, use the Yamato Talk Page. --> of Kaidou. Born as Kaidou's daughter and groomed from a young age to be his heir, Yamato instead developed a profound admiration for the legendary samurai Kouzuki Oden. After Oden's death, Yamato decided to become like him, impersonating him and adopting his mannerisms. As a result of this desire to emulate Oden, Yamato decided to become a man and identify as Kaidou's son, with his father and the Beasts Pirates referring to him as such as well. This path has put Yamato at odds with Kaidou, with much of his life being spent imprisoned on Onigashima. Yamato befriended Portgas D. Ace during his visit to Wano Country, and after learning of Ace's death waited for the arrival of his sworn brother, Monkey D. Luffy. Yamato eventually met Luffy during the Raid on Onigashima, during which he took a rebellious stance against his father and fought as a valuable ally to the samurai against the Beasts Pirates. Initially desiring to join Luffy's crew, Yamato ultimately decided to remain behind in Wano to help protect it from outside forces, though he still intends to join them in the future. Yamato is a major ally of the Straw Hats during the Wano Country Arc. He also is the central character from the Oni Child Yamato's Golden Harvest Surrogate Pilgrimage Cover Page serial.

characters.name: Kashigami
characters.short_bio: Kashigami was a giant snake that lived on Jaya four centuries ago. It was worshiped by the Shandia as a god until it was slain by Mont Blanc Noland. It is the grandparent of Nola, who lives on the land in the present day.

characters.name: Fisher Tiger
characters.japanese_name: フィッシャー・タイガー
characters.short_bio: Fisher Tiger, known as the Adventurer, was a sea bream fish-man and the founder and original captain of the Sun Pirates. A well-known explorer, Tiger became a slave for the World Nobles at some point in his adventures. After managing to escape his captors and return to Fish-Man Island, Tiger assaulted Mary Geoise in order to free his fellow slaves. This act granted Tiger infamy among humans and admiration from his fellow Fish-Men, particularly his long-time friends Jinbe and Arlong. Tiger died from blood loss after being ambushed and shot by a squad of Marines at Foolshout Island, following his delivery of a young former slave back to her home town. He is one of the two posthumous overarching protagonists of the Fish-Man Island Arc (alongside Otohime).

characters.name: Ryuma
characters.short_bio: Shimotsuki Ryuma was a legendary, world-famous samurai hailing from the Shimotsuki Family of Wano Country, who lived during Wano's "Country of Gold" era centuries ago. He was revered for his mastery of swordsmanship that earned him the title Sword God, as well as his feat of slaying a dragon. He is the direct ancestor of Shimotsuki Ushimaru and Roronoa Zoro. 23 years before the current storyline, Ryuma's consecrated grave in Ringo was ransacked and both his corpse and sword, Shusui were stolen by Gecko Moria. Eventually, his corpse was reanimated by Brook's shadow and turned into a zombie to serve Moria on Thriller Bark, until it was destroyed by Zoro himself in a sword duel while his sword was eventually returned to his grave. He is the same Ryuma from Oda's one-shot Monsters and its anime adaptation, Monsters: 103 Mercies Dragon Damnation.

characters.name: Cocoa
characters.short_bio: Cocoa was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who impersonated Nico Robin.

characters.name: Holy
characters.short_bio: Holy is a dog raised and trained by Ohm. In addition to being Ohm's pet, he is a skilled martial artist in his own right.

characters.name: Karoo
characters.short_bio: Karoo is Nefertari Vivi's pet super spot-billed duck, a fleet riding bird (one of the fastest modes of transportation available in the Arabasta Kingdom). Alongside his owner Vivi, Karoo infiltrated the organization known as Baroque Works. With her, he ended up traveling with the Straw Hat Pirates for most of the Arabasta Saga after their cover was blown. He is the leader of the Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops in Arabasta.

characters.name: Shamba
characters.short_bio: Shanba is an inhabitant of Torino Kingdom. He was first seen at the time of Chopper's arrival.

characters.name: Albion
characters.short_bio: "Gashed" Albion is one of the rookie pirates who joined the Fake Straw Hat Crew. He has a bounty of 92,000,000.

characters.name: Benn Beckman
characters.short_bio: Benn Beckman is the first mate of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Yosaku
characters.short_bio: Yosaku along with Johnny are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Baratie Arc and the Arlong Park Arc.

characters.name: Jozu
characters.epithet: "Diamond" Jozu (ダイヤ���ンド・ジョズ, Daiyamondo Jozu?)
characters.short_bio: "Diamond" Jozu is the former 3rd division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates, serving as one of the crew's most prominent members.

characters.name: Roronoa Zoro
characters.notable_info: Three-sword style swordsman, future World's Greatest Swordsman
characters.epithet: "Pirate Hunter Zoro" (海賊狩りのゾロ, Kaizoku Gari no Zoro?)
characters.role: Master Swordsman; Pirate; Crew Combatant; Senior Officer; Rōnin (temporary); Bounty Hunter (former)
characters.short_bio: :The subject of this article is sometimes called Roronoa Zolo. Roronoa Zoro, also known as "Pirate Hunter" Zoro, is the Swordsman and [[combatant of the Straw Hat Pirates, one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet, and is publicly recognized as the right-hand man and number two of his crew's captain, Monkey D. Luffy. Formerly a bounty hunter, he is the second member of Luffy's crew and the first to join it, doing so in the Romance Dawn Arc. Born in the East Blue and raised in Shimotsuki Village, Zoro is a descendant of the Shimotsuki Family of Wano Country and the legendary samurai Ryuma; his grandmother Shimotsuki Furiko, the sister of former daimyo Ushimaru, emigrated from Wano to the East Blue. As a master of Three Sword Style, Zoro is one of the three most powerful combatants of the Straw Hats, alongside Luffy and Sanji, who are referred to as the "Monster Trio". His dream is to become the greatest swordsman in the world, to honor a promise he made to his deceased childhood friend and distant cousin, Kuina. In addition to his infamy as one of the Straw Hats and as a former bounty hunter, his sizeable bounty upon arriving at the Sabaody Archipelago caused Zoro, along with Luffy, to be included among the eleven "Super Rookies", pirates who simultaneously reached the Red Line with bounties of over 100,000,000 shortly before the Summit War. He, the other ten Super Rookies, and Marshall D. Teach would go on to be referred to as the "Worst Generation." Zoro gained his first bounty of 60,000,000 after the Arabasta Arc. It later increased to 120,000,000 after the Enies Lobby incident, then again to 320,000,000 after the Dressrosa Arc. Following the Raid on Onigashima, his bounty was augmented to 1,111,000,000.

characters.name: Soro
characters.short_bio: Soro was Helmeppo's pet wolf and the main reason that Roronoa Zoro was arrested by the Marines at Shells Town. He is classified as a Type C creature, "Big Savage".

characters.name: Zeo
characters.epithet: "Noble of the Fish-Man District" (魚人街の貴族, Gyojin-gai no Kizoku?)
characters.short_bio: Zeo is a Japanese wobbegong fish-man and the self-proclaimed "Noble of the Fish-Man District". He was an officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall and disbandment. Due to his actions and role, he is considered to be a major antagonist in the Fish-Man Island Arc.

characters.name: Johnny
characters.short_bio: Johnny along with Yosaku are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Baratie Arc and the Arlong Park Arc.

characters.name: Kingdew
characters.short_bio: Kingdew is the former 11th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

characters.name: Coffee Monkeys
characters.short_bio: The Coffee Monkeys are a kidnapping group based in the Sabaody Archipelago.

characters.name: Negikuma Maria
characters.short_bio: :For other characters with the same name, see Maria (Disambiguation) Negikuma Maria is a resident of Drum Island, and friend of Dalton.

characters.name: Raideen
characters.short_bio: Raideen is a former member of the Giant Warrior Pirates. Following the crew's disbandment, he returned to Elbaph where he was shown training Hajrudin 63 years ago.

characters.name: Ririka
characters.short_bio: Ririka is a bartender who runs a local bar in Shells Town. She is Rika's mother.

characters.name: Porche
characters.short_bio: Porche is a combatant of the Foxy Pirates. She is considered an idol by the crew and is loved by all of the men. Due to her actions, she is a major antagonist during the Long Ring Long Land Arc, and a supporting antagonist in the Foxy's Return and Spa Island filler Arcs.

characters.name: Charlotte Maple
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Maple is the 26th daughter and 57th child of the Charlotte Family, the youngest quadruplet sister of Mobile, Marble, and Myukuru, and a Longarm-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Marble
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Marble is the 24th daughter and 55th child of the Charlotte Family, the second quadruplet sister of Mobile, Myukuru, and Maple, and a Longarm-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Mobile
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Mobile is the 31st son and 54th child of the Charlotte Family, the elder quadruplet brother of Marble, Myukuru, and Maple, and a Longarm-human hybrid. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Tasting, governing over Futoru Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Myukuru
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Myukuru is the 25th daughter and 56th child of the Charlotte Family, the third quadruplet sister of Mobile, Marble, and Maple, and a longarm-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Moodie
characters.short_bio:
| colorscheme = BaratieColors | jname = ムーディ | rname = Mūdi | ename = Moody | first = Chapter 43; Episode 20 | origin = East Blue | birth = November 17th | jva = Hiromi Nishikawa;
Akiko Utsumi (Live-Action Series) | Funi eva = Colleen Clinkenbeard | liveaction = Amber Hossack Moodie is a woman who Fullbody took to the Baratie.

characters.name: Higuma
characters.short_bio: Higuma was a bandit and the leader of the Higuma Bandits, active in the mountains of Dawn Island. He was the first antagonist to be introduced in the series, and the first of three in the Romance Dawn Arc (third of three in the anime).

characters.name: Brontosaurus
characters.short_bio: Brontosaurus was a dinosaur who lived on Little Garden.

characters.name: Onimaru
characters.epithet: "Gyukimaru on Oihagi Bridge" (おいはぎ橋の牛鬼丸, Oihagi-bashi no Gyūkimaru?, Viz: "Gyukimaru on Bandit's Bridge")
characters.short_bio: Onimaru is a komagitsune who was once the companion of the late daimyo of Ringo, Shimotsuki Ushimaru. After the death of his master, he joined forces with Kawamatsu in collecting weapons for the final battle against Kaidou and protecting them from robbers. After Kawamatsu was captured, Onimaru posed as a human known as Gyukimaru on Oihagi Bridge, stealing weapons from people while continuing to guard the graves.

characters.name: Bepo
characters.short_bio: Bepo is a polar bear mink and the navigator of the Heart Pirates. He is the younger brother of the late Nox Pirate Zepo.

characters.name: Mr. 11
characters.short_bio: Mr. 11 was a Frontier Agent for Baroque Works and the partner of Miss Thursday.

characters.name: Mummy Mee
characters.short_bio: Mummy Mee is one of the houseparents, alongside Daddy Dee, of a World Government-affiliated orphanage situated on the Conomi Islands.

characters.name: Nekomamushi
characters.epithet: "Master Nekomamushi" (ネコマムシの旦那, Nekomamushi no Dan'na?, Viz: "Cat Viper" Funimation: "Master Cat Viper")"Ruler of Night" (夜の王, Yoru no Ō?, Simulcast subs: "King of Night")
characters.role: Yakuza Boss; Ruler of Mokomo Dukedom (former); Guardian of the Whale Forest (former); Retainer; Samurai; Pirate Apprentice (former)
characters.short_bio: Master Nekomamushi is a feline mink and the guardian of the Whale Forest on Zou. He was one of the two rulers of the Mokomo Dukedom, dubbed the "Ruler of Night", holding the position from 6:00 PM to 6:00 AM. He and Inuarashi serve as retainers for the Kouzuki Family of Wano Country, as members of the Nine Red Scabbards. Alongside Inuarashi he was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates and Roger Pirates, serving under Kouzuki Oden. Pedro has claimed that he and Inuarashi must not be allowed to die because "the world is waiting for them". After Kaidou's fall from power, Nekomamushi became a yakuza boss in the Flower Capital. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Whole Cake Island and Wano Country Sagas.

characters.name: Chouchou
characters.short_bio: Chouchou is a dog from Orange Town, famed for his unceasing vigil over the pet-food shop founded by his deceased owner. He is classified as a Type B creature, "Small Friendly". He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Orange Town Arc.

characters.name: Ankoro
characters.short_bio: Ankoro is a gigantic anglerfish formerly under the command of captain Vander Decken IX, residing in the Underworld of the Sea, seven thousand meters underneath the ocean surface. Wadatsumi seems to regard Ankoro as a pet, as apparently Ankoro was told "not to eat ships" before.

characters.name: Kentauros
characters.short_bio: The Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops are a family of seven Super Spot-Billed Ducks (and later one camel) who serve the kingdom of Arabasta. They are led by their captain Karoo, and are reputed to be the fastest troop in the kingdom of Arabasta. All of the ducks have the strange theme of wearing different types of hats and various other jewelry and clothing. Also strange was that the last member to join the squad, Matsuge, is a camel who helped the Straw Hats confront Baroque Works.

characters.name: Kizaru
characters.short_bio: Borsalino, more commonly known by his alias Kizaru, is an Admiral in the Marines. After Kuzan resigned from the Marines and Sakazuki was promoted to Fleet Admiral, Kizaru is now the only remaining Admiral from the previous trio. He was first mentioned by Nico Robin during the Straw Hats' initial encounter with Aokiji. Due to his actions and role, Kizaru is the secondary antagonist of the Sabaody Archipelago Arc and Marineford Arc, and the tertiary antagonist of the Egghead Arc.

characters.name: Ran
characters.short_bio: Ran is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Daifuku
characters.japanese_name: シャーロット・ダイフク

devil_fruit.name: Hoya Hoya no Mi
devil_fruit.power: Allows him to summon a halberd-wielding genie from his body by rubbing his belly.

characters.short_bio: Charlotte Daifuku is the third son and fourth child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet brother of Katakuri and Oven. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Beans, governing over Poripori Island. Due to his actions and role, he is a major antagonist in the Whole Cake Island Arc.

characters.name: Charlotte Katakuri
characters.japanese_name: シャーロット・カタクリ
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Katakuri is the second son and third child of the Charlotte Family and the elder triplet brother of Daifuku and Oven. He is also one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Flour, governing over Komugi Island. Due to his actions and role, Katakuri is the secondary antagonist in the second half of the Whole Cake Island Arc. He, alongside his younger siblings Charlotte Brûlée and Oven, become temporary and reluctant allies of the Red Hair Pirates and the Straw Hat Pirates during One Piece Film: Red.

characters.name: Charlotte Oven
characters.japanese_name: シャーロット・オーブン
characters.role: Pirate Officer; Minister of Browned Food
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Oven is the fourth son and fifth child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet brother of Katakuri and Daifuku. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Browned Food, governing over Yakigashi Island. Due to his actions and role, he is a major antagonist in the Whole Cake Island Arc. He, alongside his siblings Charlotte Brûlée and Charlotte Katakuri, become temporary and reluctant allies of the Red Hair Pirates and the Straw Hat Pirates during One Piece Film: Red.

characters.name: Goro
characters.short_bio: Goro is Toto's younger brother and Koza's paternal uncle. He appeared in Gedatsu's cover story.

characters.name: Blue Gilly
characters.short_bio: Bluegilly (WT100) Blue Gilly is a martial artist from the Longleg Tribe. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he became part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet when he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.

characters.name: Tank Lepanto
characters.short_bio: Tank Lepanto is the commander of Dressrosa's Self-Defense Army. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

characters.name: Agyo
characters.short_bio: Agyo is a Animal Species/Dressrosa Saga#Fighting Lion and a gladiator competing at the [[Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.

characters.name: Bacura
characters.short_bio: Bacura is a black panther owned by the Kuja Pirates under Boa Hancock. She is said to be the executioner of the Kuja tribe, and has been serving the tribe for generations.

characters.name: Cerberus
characters.short_bio: Cerberus was a Wild Zombie who served under Gecko Moria.

characters.name: Vinsmoke Reiju
characters.japanese_name: ヴィンスモーク・レイジュ
characters.epithet: "Poison Pink" (ポイズンピンク, Poizun Pinku?)
characters.short_bio: Vinsmoke Reiju, also known as "Poison Pink", is the eldest child and only daughter of the Vinsmoke Family. She is the princess of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military army, Germa 66. She is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates in the Whole Cake Island Arc and one of the central characters in Germa 66's Ahh... An Emotionless Excursion Cover Page Serial.

characters.name: Heat
characters.short_bio: Heat is a member of the Kid Pirates.

characters.name: Ipponume
characters.short_bio: Ipponume is Ipponmatsu's wife.

characters.name: Charlotte Akimeg
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Akimeg is the 31st daughter and 71st child of the Charlotte Family and the seventh of the Charlotte Decuplets to be born. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Allmeg
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Allmeg is the 32nd daughter and 72nd child of the Charlotte Family and the eighth of the Charlotte Decuplets to be born. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Fuyumeg
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Fuyumeg is the 34th daughter and 74th child of the Charlotte Family and the tenth of the Charlotte Decuplets to be born. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Harumeg
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Harumeg is the 33rd daughter and 73rd child of the Charlotte Family and the ninth of the Charlotte Decuplets to be born. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Nutmeg
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Nutmeg is the 30th daughter and 70th child of the Charlotte Family and the sixth of the Charlotte Decuplets to be born. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Kaneshiro
characters.short_bio: Kaneshiro is the shipwright of the Arlong Pirates and a goldfish fish-man. He was previously a member of the Sun Pirates.

characters.name: Napoleon
characters.short_bio: Napoleon the Bicorne is a homie taking the form of a bicorne hat that is worn by Big Mom. He can also become a sword homie that Big Mom uses in combat. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Hera, and formerly Zeus.

characters.name: Bell-mère
characters.short_bio: Bell-mère was a former Marine and the adoptive mother of Nami and Nojiko. She raised the two girls in Cocoyasi Village for approximately nine years until she was murdered by Arlong.

characters.name: Jorl
characters.epithet: "Waterfall Beard" Jorul (滝ひげのヨルル, Takihige no Yoruru?, VIZ: Beardfall)
characters.short_bio: "Waterfall Beard" Jorul was a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, along with Jarul. He was known as a hero of the giants and one of the world's oldest warriors. 63 years ago, Jorul was mortally wounded during an attempt to stop a young, rampaging Charlotte Linlin, leading to his eventual death soon after.

characters.name: Indigo
characters.short_bio: Dr. Indigo is the scientist of the Golden Lion Pirates and the secondary antagonist of the tenth One Piece movie. He is the one who created Boss and the other monstrous animals under Shiki's dominion.

characters.name: Igaram
characters.role: Captain of the Royal Guard; Frontier Agent (former); Bounty Hunter (former); Mayor of Whisky Peak (undercover, former)
characters.short_bio: Igaram is the captain of the Arabasta royal guard (captain of Arabasta security in the English dub). He aided Nefertari Vivi in infiltrating Baroque Works as a Frontier Agent and took on the codename Mr. 8. He was partnered with Miss Monday. He is also Terracotta's husband. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Whisky Peak (after being a minor antagonist) and Arabasta Arcs.

characters.name: Ikkaku
characters.short_bio: Ikkaku is a member of the Heart Pirates.

characters.name: Yuda Snakes
characters.short_bio: This page lists all animal species encountered in the Summit War Saga.

characters.name: Jarul
characters.short_bio: "Mountain Beard" Jarul is a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, alongside Jorul. Along with Jorul, he is known as a hero of the giants, and after Jorul's death, Jarul is currently the oldest giant in the world. He has a great-great-granddaughter, Ylva, who is a student at the Walrus School.

characters.name: Kelly Funk

devil_fruit.name: Jake Jake no Mi
devil_fruit.power: Allows him to transform into a full body jacket.

characters.short_bio: Kelly Funk is an assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom and Bobby Funk's older brother. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

characters.name: Packy
characters.short_bio: Koze and Packy were members of the Yes Pirates.

characters.name: Tacos
characters.short_bio: Tacos is the king of the Shishano Kingdom and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

characters.name: Charlotte Amande
characters.short_bio: "Demon Lady" Charlotte Amande is the third daughter and seventh child of the Charlotte Family, the second quadruplet sister to Mondée, Hachée, and Effilée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Nuts, governing over Nuts Island. Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist in the Whole Cake Island Arc.

characters.name: Charlotte Effilée
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Effilée is the fifth daughter and ninth child of the Charlotte Family, the youngest quadruplet sister of Mondée, Amande, and Hachée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Hachée
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Hachée is the fourth daughter and eighth child of the Charlotte Family, the third quadruplet sister to Mondée, Amande, and Effilée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Mondée
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Mondée is the second daughter and sixth child of the Charlotte Family, the eldest quadruplet sister of Amande, Hachée, and Effilée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Edward Weevil
characters.japanese_name: エドワード・ウィーブル
characters.short_bio: Edward Weevil, or "Whitebeard Jr.", is a pirate and self-proclaimed son of the late Edward "Whitebeard" Newgate. He is the son of Buckingham Stussy, the self-proclaimed lover of Newgate. He was initiated into the Seven Warlords of the Sea sometime during the two-year timeskip, and served in their ranks until the Warlords' dissolution. Weevil was first mentioned by Marine commodore Brannew in a discussion of the, at-time, current Warlord ranks to several high-ranking Marine officers, but was not explicitly named until after Donquixote Doflamingo's defeat.

characters.name: Mr. Shimizu
characters.short_bio: Baroque Works was a criminal syndicate created by the Warlord Crocodile to destabilize and conquer the Arabasta Kingdom (and, by extension, acquire the ancient superweapon Pluton). For this sole purpose, it conducted countless acts of espionage, sabotage, and murder over a span of years, ultimately manipulating Arabasta into civil war. While the syndicate mostly employed common bounty hunters and mercenaries (motivated by the half-truth that they were building a new, "ideal" nation), its elite members contained significantly skilled combatants and spies. Despite multiple setbacks, its endgame Operation Utopia nearly succeeded in every objective, and was only narrowly stopped by the combined efforts of Princess Nefertari Vivi, the Straw Hat Pirates, and a unit of Marines led by then-Captain Smoker. After Operation Utopia's failure, the syndicate was exposed and dismantled, with Crocodile and most of his subordinates—many personally defeated by the Straw Hats—arrested by the Marines. In years to come, however, many of them would escape and continue to impact world events. Due to their actions and role, they are collectively the main antagonists of the Arabasta Saga, with varying members being the focus of each individual arc (excluding the Drum Island Arc). Several ex-members also serve as the protagonists of the Miss Goldenweek's "Operation: Meet Baroque Works" cover arc, and supporting characters in the Impel Down Arc and Marineford Arc.

characters.name: Rock
characters.short_bio: The Yeti Cool Brothers are Rock and Scotch, a pair of giant assassins who were employed by Caesar Clown. They are members of a mysterious type of giant. They serve as supporting antagonists of the Punk Hazard Arc.

characters.name: Scotch
characters.short_bio: "Iron Boy" Scotch is a member of the Beasts Pirates working as the guardian of one of the former Emperor Kaidou's favorite islands.

characters.name: Speed
characters.short_bio: Speed is a former Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates stationed in Bakura Town. She has since become a subordinate to Kurozumi Tama due to the latter's Devil Fruit powers and became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance. She has been dubbed Umami by Tama and Monkey D. Luffy.

characters.name: Chinjao
characters.epithet: Don Chinjao (首領（ドン）・チンジャオ, Don Chinjao?);"Chinjao the Drill" (錐のチンジャオ, Kiri no Chinjao?)
characters.role: 12th Leader of the Happo Navy; Pirate (former)
characters.short_bio: Chinjao, formerly known as "Don Chinjao" and "Chinjao the Drill", is a former pirate, the leader of the Chinjao Family, and the retired 12th leader of the Happo Navy. He also joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He has a bounty of 542,000,000. Although at first he confronted Luffy for his hatred against Garp, he became his ally during the Dressrosa Arc.

characters.name: King
characters.epithet: "King the Conflagration" (火災のキング, Kasai no Kingu?, English versions: "King the Wildfire")
characters.short_bio: King the Conflagration is one of the three All-Stars of the Beasts Pirates and Kaidou's right-hand man. Born as Arber, he is a member of the near-extinct lunarian race from the Red Line, noted for their ability to create fire. He was a prisoner and test subject on Punk Hazard 34 years ago, where a sample of his Lineage Factor was extracted from him before he was freed and recruited by Kaidou. That same genetic material would be used by Dr. Vegapunk decades later as a key component in the creation of the Seraphim. Due to his actions and role, he is a major antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Nezumi
characters.short_bio: Captain Nezumi is a Marine captain of the 16th Branch in the East Blue. Highly corrupt, he covered up the vast majority of Arlong's actions in the Conomi Islands in exchange for bribe money. Due to his actions, he can be considered the secondary antagonist of the Arlong Park Arc. He is also the one responsible for officially making Monkey D. Luffy a wanted criminal to the World Government by requesting his first ever bounty.

characters.name: Faust
characters.short_bio: Faust is a cat mink from North Blue and a member of the Hawkins Pirates, serving as the crew's magician.

characters.name: Pica
characters.short_bio: Pica is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Spade seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Pica Army subdivision. Due to his actions and role, he is one of the major antagonists in the Dressrosa Arc.

characters.name: Charlotte Noisette
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Noisette is the 15th son and 24th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Finance, governing over Kinko Island.

characters.name: Nerine
characters.short_bio: Nerine is a member of the Kuja from Amazon Lily.

characters.name: Charlotte Cornstarch
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Cornstarch is the 11th daughter and 27th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet sister of Moscato and Mash. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Love, governing over Loving Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Mash
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Mash is the tenth daughter and 26th child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet sister of Moscato and Cornstarch. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Moscato
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Moscato is the 16th son and 25th child of the Charlotte Family and the eldest triplet brother of Mash and Cornstarch. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Gelato, governing over Ice Island.

characters.name: Inuppe
characters.short_bio: Inuppe was a Wild Zombie on Thriller Bark in the service of Gecko Moria. He was animated with Sanji's shadow and eventually assigned to guard Hogback. Due to his actions and role, he is a supporting antagonist in the Thriller Bark Arc.

characters.name: Banchina
characters.short_bio: Banchina was Usopp's mother and Yasopp's wife. She died of a sickness in Syrup Village when Usopp was still young.

characters.name: Yuki
characters.short_bio: Yuki was a young girl over 100 years ago. She was responsible for starting the century-long duel between Dorry and Brogy.

characters.name: Byron
characters.short_bio: Byron is one of the slaves who was sold at the Human Auctioning House and was the first in the queue for sale. He is a pirate and musician.

characters.name: Zunisha
characters.short_bio: Zunesha is a Naitamie-Norida elephant that was affiliated with Joy Boy 800 years ago. It now wanders through the New World and carries the island of Zou on its back as punishment for an unspecified crime it committed in the past.

characters.name: Dogra
characters.short_bio: Dogra is a member of Dadan's bandits that are active on Mt. Colubo on Dawn Island. He helped take care of Ace and Luffy for Garp.

characters.name: Hogback
characters.epithet: "Doctor Hogback" (ドクトル・ホグバック, Dokutoru Hogubakku?)"Genius Surgeon" (天才外科医, Tensai Gekai?)
characters.short_bio: Doctor Hogback is the world-renowned "Genius Surgeon" who joined the Thriller Bark Pirates under the employment of Gecko Moria and assisted him in creating his undead army. He was one of the Mysterious Four and the secondary antagonist of the Thriller Bark Saga. He also acts as the de facto main antagonist in the anime only Great Mikoshi Race Arc.

characters.name: Charlotte Marnier
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Marnier is the 13th daughter and 32nd child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin sister of Mozart. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Yeast, governing over Kibo Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Mozart
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Mozart is the 12th daughter and 31st child of the Charlotte Family and the elder twin sister of Marnier. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Louis Arnote
characters.short_bio: Louis Arnote is an explorer and one of the people whose adventures are recorded in Brag Men, a book of Grand Line tales. Arnote is famous for giving Little Garden its name. Though implied to be a true tale due to its inclusion in Brag Men, it is considered by the rest of the world to be a mere fantasy. Arnote also visited Elbaph and wrote a description of its grandeur, though he warned people not to overstay their welcome for as of yet unknown reasons.

characters.name: Mother Carmel
characters.role: Child Trafficker; Caretaker of Sheep's House
characters.short_bio: Mother Carmel was a child trafficker dealing in orphans, that operated in the Underworld several decades ago, under the code name of "Mountain Witch". Running an orphanage known as the "Sheep's House", her seemingly benevolent nature caused her to be known as the "Holy Mother". In reality, she sold her orphan wards to the World Government every two years to be trained as Marines or Cipher Pol agents, until she met her end 62 years ago. Notably, she took care of a young Charlotte Linlin, who would later go on to become the Emperor Big Mom.

characters.name: Gan Fall
characters.epithet: "Knight of the Sky" (空の騎士, Sora no Kishi?, VIZ and Funimation: Sky Knight, 4Kids: Sky Lord)
characters.short_bio: Gan Fall is the current God of Skypiea. A venerable figure who served in that role for decades, he was overthrown by Enel and cast out of power for six years. During his exile, he roamed the sky as a mercenary known as the Knight of the Sky. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Skypiea Arc.

characters.name: Miyagi
characters.short_bio: Miyagi is a goat mink and one of Inuarashi's subjects,until Carrot took the throne of Mokomo Dukedom.

characters.name: Kouzuki Hiyori
characters.short_bio: Kouzuki Hiyori is the daughter of the late Kouzuki Oden and Kouzuki Toki and the younger sister of Kouzuki Momonosuke. To hide her identity, Hiyori became known as Komurasaki, working as an oiran of the rank, the highest of all. However, after she angered Kurozumi Orochi, Denjiro (in his disguise as Kyoshiro) staged a killing of Komurasaki in order to keep Hiyori safe. She is the one who gave her late father's legendary sword Enma to Roronoa Zoro in exchange for Shusui. After Kaidou was defeated in the Raid on Onigashima, she revealed to Wano that she was still alive as well as her true identity. Hiyori now lives in the Flower Capital with her brother after he became the new Shogun. She is also the caretaker of Toko. Hiyori is a supporting ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Wano Country Saga.

characters.name: Tony Tony Chopper
characters.japanese_name: トニートニー・チョッパー
characters.notable_info: Reindeer doctor with human intelligence, Rumble Ball transformations
characters.epithet: "Cotton Candy Lover" (わたあめ大好き, Wataame Daisuki?)
characters.short_bio: Tony Tony Chopper, also known as "Cotton Candy Lover" Chopper, is the doctor of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the sixth member of the crew and the fifth to join, doing so at the end of the Drum Island Arc. He was temporarily forced to join the Foxy Pirates during the Long Ring Long Land Arc but was quickly returned to Luffy's crew. Chopper is a reindeer that ate the Hito Hito no Mi, a Devil Fruit that allows its user to transform into a human hybrid at will. He was taught medicine on Drum Island by his two parental figures, Doctors Hiriluk and Kureha. Chopper aims to travel all across the world in the hopes of accomplishing his dream of being able to cure any disease. Chopper gained his first bounty of 50 after the incident at Enies Lobby, having been mistaken for the Straw Hats' pet. After the Dressrosa Arc, it was increased to 100, then to 1,000 following the Raid on Onigashima.

characters.name: Jesus Burgess
characters.japanese_name: ジーザス・バージェス
characters.role: Titanic Captain (Captain of the First Ship); Helmsman
characters.short_bio: Jesus Burgess, better known as the "Champion", is the helmsman and one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, serving as the captain of the first ship of the fleet. Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Jaya Arc, a supporting antagonist in the Impel Down, Marineford, and Dressrosa Arcs, a minor antagonist in the Egghead Arc, and a major antagonist in the Final Saga.

characters.name: Miss Merry Christmas

devil_fruit.name: Mogu Mogu no Mi
devil_fruit.power: Allows her to transform into a mole or a mole-human hybrid.

characters.short_bio: "Town-Collapser" Drophy, better known by her alias Miss Merry Christmas, is a former officer agent partnered with Mr. 4. She was a major antagonist during the Arabasta Arc. After the downfall of Baroque Works, she works as a "princess" at the new Spiders Cafe alongside most of her former colleagues.

characters.name: Charlotte Broyé
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Broyé is the ninth daughter and 20th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin sister of Brûlée. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Meringue, governing over Milenge Island.

characters.name: Mashikaku
characters.short_bio: Chief Petty Officer Mashikaku is a subordinate of Smoker and Tashigi. However, it is unknown if he remained with the two after they transferred to G-5 as he is not seen with the G-5 Marines.

characters.name: Akumai
characters.short_bio: Akumai was a Billions agent who followed Mr. 2 Bon Kurei everywhere before he was captured by Hina when Mr. 2 and his crew sacrificed themselves to save the Straw Hat Pirates.

characters.name: Lines
characters.short_bio: Seaman First Class Lines is a former subordinate of Fullbody from his time as a lieutenant.

characters.name: Jango
characters.epithet: "One-Two" Jango (as a pirate) (1・2のジャンゴ, Ichi Ni no Jango?);"Jango the Turncoat" (Marine) (寝返りのジャンゴ, Negaeri no Jango?)
characters.role: Marine Lieutenant Commander; Marine Seaman Recruit (promoted); Pirate (former); Captain (former), First Mate (former), Dancer (former)
characters.short_bio: The subject of this article is sometimes called Django. Jango the Turncoat is a hypnotist and Marine lieutenant commander serving under Rear Admiral Hina. Formerly the first mate—and for a time captain—of the Black Cat Pirates known as "One-Two" Jango, he enlisted in the Marines after finding an unlikely friendship with Fullbody, who helped him to secure a pardon. Due to his actions, Jango can be considered the secondary antagonist of the Syrup Village Arc. He is also the protagonist of the Jango's Dance Paradise cover arc.

characters.name: Lu Feld
characters.short_bio: Lu Feld, known as the "God of Fortune", is the "Loan Shark King". He is a member of the Lu Feld Conglomerate, the former financer of MADS, and an emperor of the Underworld.

characters.name: Absalom
characters.epithet: Absalom of the Graveyard (墓場のアブサロム, Hakaba no Abusaromu?)
characters.role: ReporterSoldier Zombies and General Zombies Commander
characters.short_bio: Absalom of the Graveyard was the commander of the Soldier Zombies and General Zombies of Thriller Bark prior to its collapse. He was one of the Mysterious Four of the Thriller Bark Pirates and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga. Sometime during the timeskip, he became a reporter under the alias Absa. At some point, he was abducted by the Blackbeard Pirates and killed to poach his Devil Fruit powers, with his ability going to Shiryu.

characters.name: Gol D. Roger
characters.japanese_name: ゴール・D（ディー）・ロジャー
characters.notable_info: Pirate King, reached Laugh Tale, father of Portgas D. Ace
characters.epithet: Pirate King (海賊王, Kaizoku-Ō?, King of the Pirates (English versions))
characters.short_bio: Gol D. Roger, more commonly known as Gold Roger, was a legendary pirate who, as captain of the Roger Pirates, held the title of Pirate King and possessed the legendary treasure known as the One Piece. He was also the lover of Portgas D. Rouge and the biological father of Portgas D. Ace. Roger was the first pirate in history since Joy Boy to circumnavigate the Grand Line, culminating in reaching its final island which he named Laugh Tale. However, knowing that his life was limited by an incurable disease, Roger disbanded his crew and turned himself in to be executed. Though the World Government staged the execution as a public spectacle to discourage piracy, Roger used his final words to ensure the opposite, openly declaring that the One Piece belonged to anyone that could find it. As such, he singlehandedly began the Great Pirate Era. Because of his past actions and achievements, Roger is a central background character in the series as a whole.

characters.name: Abdullah
characters.short_bio: Abdullah is a criminal and a former bounty hunter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, along with his partner Jeet. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.

characters.name: Agsilly
characters.short_bio: Agsilly is a New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.

characters.name: Akehende
characters.short_bio: Akehende is a Marine Rear Admiral.

characters.name: Akisu
characters.short_bio: Akisu is a young thief that appeared in the second movie. He is the adoptive younger brother of Borodo and the younger of the two "Thief Brothers".

characters.name: Alpacaman
characters.short_bio: Alpacaman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mines of the Udon Region of Wano Country.

characters.name: Apis
characters.short_bio: Apis is a young girl who lives on Warship Island. Her grandfather is Bokuden. She is the main ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Warship Island Arc.

characters.name: Arthur
characters.short_bio: Arthur is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Ashura Doji
characters.short_bio: Ashura Doji was a bandit, samurai from Wano Country and a retainer of the Kouzuki Family, serving as one of Kouzuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. After Oden's death, he returned to being a criminal under the name Shutenmaru, assuming leadership of the Mt. Atama Thieves. He initially severed his ties with the Kouzuki Family in the present but rejoined after witnessing Yasuie's death. Ashura eventually met his demise during the Raid on Onigashima, sacrificing himself to protect his fellow Scabbards from one of Kanjuro's schemes. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Babe
characters.short_bio: "Catcher-Killing" Babe, better known by his alias Mr. 4, is a former officer agent of the Baroque Works and partner of Miss Merry Christmas. He is also Lassoo's owner. He was a major antagonist during the Arabasta Arc. After the group's dissolution, he became a pizza delivery boy, stationed at the new Spiders Cafe.

characters.name: Baccarat

devil_fruit.name: Fruit of Luck
devil_fruit.power: This fruit enables its user to steal luck from those he touches and use it for himself.

characters.short_bio: Baccarat is a concierge on Gran Tesoro and an executive member of Gild Tesoro's crew. She appears in One Piece Film: Gold.

characters.name: Baggaley
characters.short_bio: Baggaley is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.

characters.name: Bankuro
characters.short_bio: Bankuro was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Bao Huang

devil_fruit.name: Flying Squirrel SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms into a flying squirrel.

characters.short_bio: Bao Huang is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the crew's surveillance division, the "Marys". She appears to have the duty of keeping and presenting daily schedules for the crew and their captain Kaidou.

characters.name: Batman

devil_fruit.name: Bat SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a bat.

characters.short_bio: Batman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist of the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Bear King

devil_fruit.name: Unbreakable Fruit
devil_fruit.power: whoever eats it becomes as hard as rock, and can increase the heat of certain body parts so that his opponent burns himself by touching them.

characters.short_bio: Bear King is the leader of the Trump Pirates and the eldest of the Trump Siblings that ruled over Clockwork Island. He is the main antagonist of the second movie.

devil_fruit.name: Fruit of the Insect, Wasp version
devil_fruit.japanese_name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Moderu Suzumebachi
devil_fruit.power: whoever eats it can turn into a wasp. It enables the user to fly.

characters.name: Biera
characters.short_bio: Biera is a character from the fourth movie. He was the stoker for the boiler on Gasparde's ship, the Salamander. He was forced to take this job to protect himself and Adelle Bascùd (who calls him "Grandpa").

characters.name: Bigalo
characters.short_bio: Bigalo is a pirate from the fourth One Piece movie, mainly known as Bigalo the Hanged Man. He and his crew competed in the Dead End Race.

characters.name: Billy
characters.short_bio: Billy a giant electricity producing bird from the tenth One Piece movie. He was originally a creation of Dr. Indigo, but he aids Luffy in fighting against Shiki in the air.

characters.name: Bismarck
characters.short_bio: Bismarck is a Marine from the fifth movie and a subordinate of Saga. During the film, he was under the influence of Saga and the Shichiseiken.

characters.name: Bokuden
characters.short_bio: Bokuden is Apis' grandfather. He lives on Warship Island.

characters.name: Bonk Punch
characters.short_bio: Bonk Punch is one of the Senior Officers and musicians of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Boo Jack
characters.short_bio: Boo Jack is one of the Trump Siblings Pirates who appeared in the second movie as one of the major antagonists.

characters.name: Borodo
characters.short_bio: Borodo is a thief that debuted in the second movie. He is the adoptive brother of Akisu and the elder of the two "Thief Brothers".

characters.name: Brew
characters.short_bio: Brew is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Brief
characters.short_bio: Brief is a pirate that appears in the sixth movie, Baron Omatsuri and the Secret Island.

characters.name: Briscola

devil_fruit.name: Gorilla SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a gorilla

characters.short_bio: Briscola is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

characters.name: Brocca
characters.short_bio: Brocca is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Buena Festa
characters.short_bio: "Master of Festivities" Buena Festa is the captain of the Festival Pirates and the secondary antagonist of One Piece: Stampede. He organized the Pirates Festival in conjunction with Douglas Bullet in order to bring an end to the Great Age of Pirates and start his own era.

characters.name: Building Snake
characters.short_bio: Building Snake is one of the Senior Officers and the navigator of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Bunbuku

devil_fruit.name: Canid Fruit, Tanuki version
devil_fruit.japanese_name: Inu Inu no Mi Moderu Bake-danuki
devil_fruit.power: whoever eats it can transform into a tanuki.

characters.short_bio: Bunbuku is a teapot owned by Tenguyama Hitetsu that was given life by "eating" the Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki.

characters.name: Buzz

devil_fruit.name: Fruit of the Volatile, Eagle version
devil_fruit.japanese_name: Tori Tori no Mi moderu Washi
devil_fruit.power: Very similar to the Falcon version of Fruit du Volatile

characters.short_bio: Buzz is the bulldog of the Schneider Pirates who appeared in the eleventh movie.

characters.name: Caimanlady

devil_fruit.name: Caiman SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a caiman

characters.short_bio: Caimanlady is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the surveillance division called the "Marys".

characters.name: Cancer
characters.short_bio: Cancer is a Marine vice admiral.

characters.name: Cands
characters.short_bio: Cands is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard. He only appears in the manga.

characters.name: Carina
characters.short_bio: "Phantom Thief" Carina is a character who appears in Heart of Gold and One Piece Film: Gold. She is a thief who formerly worked as a songstress in Gran Tesoro, plotting to steal its riches. After helping the Straw Hat Pirates overthrow Gild Tesoro, Carina took command of Gran Tesoro.

characters.name: Catacombo
characters.short_bio: Rear Admiral Catacombo is a Marine officer who led a team to capture the Straw Hat Pirates. Non-canonically, he is the Base Commander of the GR 66 Marine Base on the Sabaody Archipelago.

characters.name: CB Gallant
characters.short_bio: CB Gallant was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Charlotte Basans
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Basans is the 23rd son and 39th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of Saint-Marc. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Brownie
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Brownie is the 32nd son and 58th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He joined Charlotte Oven's army to intercept the Straw Hat Pirates on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Chiboust
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Chiboust is the 30th son and 51st child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Mix, governing over Sanshoku Island. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Luffy on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Compo
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Compo is the 17th son and 28th child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin brother of Laurin. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Pie, governing over Piepie Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Dacquoise
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Dacquoise is the 24th son and 41st child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Jam, governing over Jam Island.

characters.name: Charlotte De-Chat
characters.short_bio: Charlotte De-Chat is the 44th son and the 81st child of the Charlotte Family. He is a hybrid between a human and a fish-man.

characters.name: Charlotte High-Fat
characters.short_bio: Charlotte High-Fat is the 20th son and 33rd child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin brother of Tablet. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Joconde
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Joconde is the 27th daughter and 59th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was also a member of Charlotte Oven's army to intercept the Straw Hat Pirates on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Kanten
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Kanten is the 27th son and 48th child of the Charlotte Family and the eldest triplet brother of Kato and Montb. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Agar, governing over Jelly Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Kato
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Kato is the 28th son and 49th child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet brother of Kanten and Montb. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Seeds, governing over Tanega Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Laurin
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Laurin is the 18th son and 29th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of Compo. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Charlotte Montb
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Montb is the 29th son and 50th child of the Charlotte Family and the youngest triplet brother of Kanten and Kato. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Normande
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Normande is the 38th daughter and the 82nd child of the Charlotte Family. She is a dosundada, a hybrid between a human and a dwarf.

characters.name: Charlotte Nougat
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Nougat is the 41st son and 75th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Panna
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Panna is the 28th daughter and 61st child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Saint-Marc
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Saint-Marc (WT100) Charlotte Saint-Marc is the 22nd son and the 38th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Essence, governing over Flavor Island. He is the older twin brother of Basans.

characters.name: Charlotte Tablet
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Tablet is the 21st son and 34th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of High-Fat. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Toppings, governing over Topping Island.

characters.name: Charlotte Wafers
