characters.short_bio: Charlotte Wafers is the 37th daughter and the 79th child of the Charlotte Family.

characters.name: Charlotte Wiro
characters.short_bio: Charlotte Wiro is the 43rd son and the 80th child of the Charlotte Family. He is a Human-Snakeneck hybrid.

characters.name: Shandian Chief
characters.short_bio: The Shandia chief is the leader of the Shandia tribe.

characters.name: Choi
characters.short_bio: Choi is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.

characters.name: Mugren
characters.short_bio: Colonel Mugren was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Colscon
characters.short_bio: Colscon is an infamous New World pirate captain who allied himself with Whitebeard.

characters.name: Dachoman

devil_fruit.name: Ostrich SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into an ostrich.

characters.short_bio: Dachoman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

characters.name: Dice
characters.short_bio: Dice is an underground champion in death matches who is an executive member of Gild Tesoro's crew and works on Gran Tesoro as the dealer. He appears in One Piece Film: Gold.

characters.name: Didit
characters.short_bio: Didit is a noble living in the Goa Kingdom on Dawn Island. She is the wife of Outlook III, the biological mother of Sabo, and the adoptive mother of Sterry.

characters.name: Donald Moderate
characters.short_bio: Donald Moderate is the presenter of the Pirates Festival in the film One Piece: Stampede.

characters.name: Donquino
characters.short_bio: Donquino was the helmsman of the Roger Pirates.

characters.name: Draw
characters.short_bio: Draw is a Marine Vice Admiral and the main antagonist of One Piece novel A Volume 1.

characters.name: Doringo
characters.short_bio: Doringo was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Drophy

devil_fruit.name: Digging Fruit
devil_fruit.power: whoever eats it becomes half-mole. It can dig gigantic galleries in almost any material.

characters.short_bio: "Town-Collapser" Drophy, better known by her alias Miss Merry Christmas, is a former officer agent partnered with Mr. 4. She was a major antagonist during the Arabasta Arc. After the downfall of Baroque Works, she works as a "princess" at the new Spiders Cafe alongside most of her former colleagues.

characters.name: Eldoraggo

devil_fruit.name: Fruit of the Vocalise
devil_fruit.power: the person who has eaten this fruit uses sound beams converted into lasers to destroy everything in his path.

characters.short_bio: Eldoraggo is the captain of the Eldoraggo Pirates and the main antagonist of the first One Piece movie.

characters.name: Forliewbs
characters.short_bio: Forliewbs is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to the Whitebeard Pirates.

characters.name: Fourtricks

devil_fruit.name: SMILE du coq
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a rooster

characters.short_bio: Fourtricks is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates.

characters.name: Fuga
characters.short_bio: Fuga is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "two".

characters.name: Ganryu
characters.short_bio: Ganryu is a member of the Spade Pirates and a member of the Longarm Tribe.

characters.name: Ganzo
characters.short_bio: Ganzo is a traveling oden chef, the grandfather of Tobio, and a childhood friend to the legendary gold pirate Woonan. He serves as a supporting character in One Piece: The Movie.

characters.name: Gazelleman

devil_fruit.name: SMILE de gazelle
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a gazelle.

characters.short_bio: Gazelleman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. After being tamed by Tama, he became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

characters.name: Gecko Moria

devil_fruit.name: Fruit of the Shadow
devil_fruit.power: Allows its user to control shadows. He can cut the shadows of anyone with a pair of scissors, and the shadows thus removed can be locked into inert bodies, giving rise to zombies possessing the combat techniques of the person to whom the shadow belonged. If shadows are enclosed in the body of a living being, they can only remain for a short time, depending on the latter's mental strength. For example, its user has consumed up to 1000 of them. It should also be noted that the user can use his own shadow and make it tangible. He can therefore use his shadow to teleport or protect himself from physical attacks.

characters.short_bio: Gecko Moria is the captain of the Thriller Bark Pirates and a former member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea who resides on Thriller Bark, the largest ship in the world. His bounty is 320,000,000, which was frozen until he lost his Warlord position. In his youth, Moria served as captain of the Gecko Pirates, until a vast majority of its members were killed in a fight against Kaidou of the Four Emperors. This traumatic event led Moria to seek power through an army of zombies, constructed by his subordinate, Dr. Hogback. To that end he stole the shadows of several beings with his Kage Kage no Mi powers, including Brook and several members of the Straw Hat Pirates, bringing him into conflict with them. His zombie army was ultimately destroyed and the captured shadows set free after his defeat, but he retained his position as a Warlord and escaped Thriller Bark with the remnants of his crew. He took part in the Summit War of Marineford and sided with the Marines along with most of the other Warlords. After the end of the war, he was stripped of his title and was to be eliminated by Donquixote Doflamingo, but he managed to escape into the New World. Vegapunk later cloned Moria as one of the Seraphim to replace the Warlords. Two years after the war, he attacked the Blackbeard Pirates on Hachinosu, but was defeated and imprisoned when he refused to join Blackbeard. He was later rescued by Perona with the help of Koby. He is the main antagonist of the Thriller Bark Saga and a major antagonist in the Marineford Arc.

characters.name: Goki
characters.short_bio: Goki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "five". Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Golass
characters.short_bio: Golass is the secondary antagonist in the first One Piece movie, working as a mercenary for Eldoraggo.

characters.name: Gordon
characters.short_bio: Gordon is the former king of the Elegia Kingdom and the foster parent of Uta. He is a major ally in One Piece Film: Red.

characters.name: Great Michael
characters.short_bio: Great Michael is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

characters.name: Gancho
characters.short_bio: Gancho is the king, also called "Tonta-Chief", of the Tontatta Kingdom.

characters.name: Hamlet
characters.short_bio: Hamlet is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

characters.name: Hangan
characters.short_bio: Hangan is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

characters.name: Happygun
characters.short_bio: Happygun is an infamous New World pirate who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Kurozumi Higurashi

devil_fruit.name: Travesti-Fruit
devil_fruit.power: Allows you to change your appearance by touching your face with your right hand, and to return to your normal appearance by touching your face with your left hand. You only need to touch a person once for their appearance to be remembered forever. The user can also assemble parts of different people, but is unable to attack unless he possesses his own face and body.

characters.short_bio: Kurozumi Higurashi was a member of the Kurozumi Family and a major supporter of Kurozumi Orochi. She was killed by Kaidou for her interruption in his fight with Kouzuki Oden. Due of her actions and role, she was a major overarching antagonist in the Wano Country Arc and Saga.

characters.name: Honey Queen

devil_fruit.name: Fruit of Dissolution
devil_fruit.power: This fruit enables its user to dissolve anything into liquid, including himself, by shooting rays into his opponents' eyes.

characters.short_bio: Honey Queen is a member of the Trump Siblings. She appeared first in the second One Piece movie as one of the major antagonists.

characters.name: Hongo
characters.short_bio: Hongo is the one of the Senior Officers and the doctor of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Honki
characters.short_bio: Colonel Honki is one of Ratchet's subordinates.

characters.name: Hotdog
characters.short_bio: General Hotdog is one of Count Battler's henchmen who helps him to look for the Crowned Treasure Horns. He appears in the third movie as one of the secondary antagonists, along with Heaby.

characters.name: Hotei
characters.short_bio: Hotei is the former captain of the Mimawarigumi, a samurai police force in Wano Country that served the shogun Kurozumi Orochi until he was deposed by Kaidou. Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Inbi
characters.short_bio: Inbi is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "one".

characters.name: Izaya
characters.short_bio: Izaya is Maya's grandmother and lives on Asuka Island. She appeared in the fifth One Piece movie.

characters.name: Jacksonbanner
characters.short_bio: Jacksonbanner was the musician of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Jaki
characters.short_bio: Jaki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "four". Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Jeet
characters.short_bio: Jeet is a criminal and a former bounty hunter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, along with his partner, Abdullah. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.

characters.name: Juki
characters.short_bio: Juki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "ten". Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Julius
characters.short_bio: Julius is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

characters.name: Kechatch
characters.short_bio: Kechatch is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to the Whitebeard Pirates.

characters.name: Kikunojo
characters.short_bio: Kikunojo of the Lingering Snow, more commonly referred to as Kiku, is a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer for the Kouzuki Family, serving as one of Kouzuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. She is also the younger sister of Izou and the daughter of the dancing school head of the Hanayanagi School in Ringo. After traveling forward in time, she worked as a tea house poster girl in Okobore Town while gathering information for the planned rebellion. She participated in the Raid on Onigashima where she battled Kaidou alongside the other Scabbards, losing her left arm to one of Kaidou's attacks. Following Kouzuki Momonosuke's ascent to shogun, she serves as the daimyo of Ringo. She is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Kinga
characters.short_bio: Kinga is an infamous New World pirate who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Komachiyo
characters.short_bio: Komachiyo is a komainu that resides in the Kuri region of Wano Country. It has been Kurozumi Tama's best friend since their childhood.

characters.name: Shimotsuki Kouzaburou
characters.short_bio: Shimotsuki Kouzaburou was a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a swordsmith who crafted the Great Grade Blades, Wado Ichimonji and Enma. He was born in Wano Country, but illegally departed from there 55 years ago and eventually settled down in what became Shimotsuki Village in the East Blue. There, he fathered a son named Koushirou, making him the grandfather of Koushirou's daughter Kuina.

characters.name: Kunyun
characters.short_bio: Kunyun is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "nine". Due to her actions and role, she is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Lacos
characters.short_bio: Lacos is an inhabitant of Asuka Island and leader of his village’s warriors. He is a secondary protagonist from the fifth movie.

characters.name: Lily Carnation
characters.short_bio: Lily Carnation was a monstrous, sapient plant and the main antagonist of Baron Omatsuri and the Secret Island.

characters.name: Limejuice
characters.short_bio: Limejuice is one of the Senior Officers of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Loki
characters.short_bio: Loki is the prince of Elbaph, being the son of King Harald and Queen Estrid, as well as the younger half-brother of Hajrudin. Known as the "Accursed Prince" and the "Shame of Elbaph", he is believed by Elbaph's giants to have killed his father in order to obtain an unspecified Devil Fruit, leading to his imprisonment. Loki refers to himself as the Sun God, a deity worshiped by Elbaph's populace, and claims he will be the one to "end the world". He was once arranged to marry Charlotte Lola, which would have allied Elbaph with the Big Mom Pirates, until Lola ran away. He is a major character in the Elbaph Arc.

characters.name: Maha
characters.short_bio: Maha is a masked agent of CP0. Due to his actions and role, he is a supporting antagonist during the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Maji
characters.short_bio: General Maji was one of Ratchet's subordinates, acting as one of Mecha Island's generals.

characters.name: Marianne
characters.short_bio: Marianne, also known as the "Flag-Bearer of Freedom" and more commonly by her alias Miss Goldenweek, is a former officer agent of Baroque Works and the partner of Mr. 3. She is currently working as a painter at the new Spider's Cafe alongside many of her former colleagues. She is the secondary antagonist of the Little Garden Arc and the protagonist in Miss Goldenweek's "Operation: Meet Baroque Works".

characters.name: MAX Marx
characters.short_bio: MAX Marx was the cook of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Maya
characters.short_bio: Maya is Saga's fiancé and Izaya's granddaughter. She is also the descendant of the priestess who sealed the Shichiseiken. She appeared in the fifth movie.

characters.name: Mikita

devil_fruit.name: Kilo-Kilo Fruit
devil_fruit.power: Allows the user's mass to be varied between a featherweight and 10 tons. Note that the user's volume does not change when he changes his mass.

characters.short_bio: "Courier" Mikita, more commonly known by her alias Miss Valentine, is a former officer agent who was partnered with Mr. 5. As of now, she is currently working as a chocolate lady alongside most of the other Baroque Works members at the new Spiders Cafe. She is one of the main antagonists of the Whisky Peak Arc and a tertiary antagonist of the Little Garden Arc.

characters.name: Millet Pine
characters.short_bio: Millet Pine was the torturer of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution.

characters.name: Mizerka

devil_fruit.name: Gorilla SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a gorilla

characters.short_bio: Mizerka is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, she was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

characters.name: Moon Isaac Jr.
characters.short_bio: Moon Isaac Jr. was a member of the Roger Pirates and their [[Staff until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Mounblutain
characters.short_bio: Mounblutain was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who masqueraded as Sogeking.

characters.name: Mouseman
characters.short_bio: Mouseman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. He resides in Bakura Town.

characters.name: Mozambia
characters.short_bio: Vice Admiral Mozambia is a Marine officer who attended the meeting with the Seven Warlords of the Sea to discuss Crocodile's replacement.

characters.name: Musshuru

devil_fruit.name: Chamquipue fruit
devil_fruit.power: the person eating the fruit can create poisonous spores. These spores can take various forms (laser beams, clones, etc.). Of course, the user is immune to poison, but his power is vulnerable to fire.

characters.short_bio: Musshuru is the secondary antagonist in the 9th movie. He is Wapol's older brother in the movie and was designed by Oda for it.

characters.name: Nangi
characters.short_bio: Nangi is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "seven". Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Needless
characters.short_bio: Needless is a pirate and the right hand man of Gasparde. With a bounty of 57,000,000. He was the secondary antagonist of the fourth movie.

characters.name: Nefertari Titi
characters.short_bio: Nefertari Titi was the queen of the Arabasta Kingdom, Nefertari Cobra's wife, and Nefertari Vivi's mother.

characters.name: Ninth
characters.short_bio: Ninth is a New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

characters.name: Nosgarl
characters.short_bio: Nosgarl is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

characters.name: Omasa
characters.rank: head of a yakuza clan in the Udon region
characters.short_bio: "Blood-Writing" Omasa is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Udon region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.

characters.name: Omatsuri
characters.short_bio: Baron Omatsuri was the secondary antagonist of the sixth One Piece movie and the captain of the Red Arrows Pirates.

characters.name: Outlook III
characters.short_bio: Outlook III is a noble of the Goa Kingdom. He is the husband of Didit, the biological father of Sabo, and the adoptive father of Sterry.

characters.name: Pavlik
characters.short_bio: Pavlik is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Pin Joker
characters.short_bio: Pin Joker is a member of the Trump Pirates, who appeared in the second One Piece movie as one of the major antagonists.

characters.name: Poker
characters.short_bio: Poker is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

characters.name: Shaka
characters.short_bio: Shaka, also designated as , is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "good". He is a major ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead Arc.

characters.name: Lilith
characters.short_bio: Lilith, also designated as , is one of six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "evil". She is a major ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead and Elbaph Arcs, and ultimately the only Vegapunk to escape with them after the Egghead Incident.

characters.name: Edison
characters.short_bio: Edison, also designated as , is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "thinking". He is a major companion and ally to the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead Arc.

characters.name: Pythagoras
characters.short_bio: Pythagoras, also designated as , is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "wisdom". He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead Arc.

characters.name: Atlas
characters.short_bio: Atlas, also designated as , is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his emotions of frustrations and stress which was relieved through "violence". She is a major ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead Arc.

characters.name: York
characters.short_bio: York, also designated as , is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "greed". She acted as an ally to the Straw Hat Pirates at first, but was later revealed to be a traitor responsible for instigating the Egghead Incident and many of the events prior during the Egghead Arc. Due to her actions, she is a major antagonist in the aforementioned arc. After Jaygarcia Saturn's demise, York has become the direct subordinate to Saturn's replacement, Figarland Garling.

characters.name: Rabbitman

devil_fruit.name: Rabbit SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a rabbit.

characters.short_bio: Rabbitman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

characters.name: Ramen
characters.short_bio: Ramen is the king of the Kano Country and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

characters.name: Rangram
characters.short_bio: Rangram was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Ratchet
characters.short_bio: Dr. Ratchet is the main antagonist of the seventh movie, a great inventor who believes that with his natural genius he should rule the world. He is the Feudal Lord of Mecha Island.

characters.name: Reforte
characters.short_bio: Reforte is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Rokki
characters.short_bio: Rokki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "six".

characters.name: Rowing
characters.short_bio: Rowing was the scholar of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Rush
characters.short_bio: Rush is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

characters.name: Saga
characters.short_bio: Saga is the main antagonist of the fifth One Piece movie. He was a childhood friend of Zoro and Maya's fiance. The real Saga is a friendly, honorable, and ambitious young man; however, he was under the control of the cursed sword, the Shichiseiken. He is a Marine swordsman and is the master of a marine dojo.

characters.name: Sarahebi

devil_fruit.name: SMILE of snake
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a snake.

characters.short_bio: Sarahebi is a Gifter of the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria. She was also a school teacher in the Flower Capital.

characters.name: Sarfunkel
characters.short_bio: Sarfunkel is an inhabitant on the Island of Rare Animals. She is described as a barrel woman.

characters.name: Scarlett
characters.short_bio: Scarlett was the first daughter of the Riku Family and the former crown princess of Dressrosa until falsifying her own death. She was Viola's elder sister, Kyros' wife, and Rebecca's mother. She was killed by Diamante when the Donquixote Pirates took over Dressrosa ten years ago.

characters.name: Schneider
characters.short_bio: Schneider is the captain of the Schneider Pirates and a character from the film One Piece 3D: Straw Hat Chase. He gives off the air of having a distinguished past, but his only crewmate and companion now is Buzz. He was alone and unconscious when the Straw Hat Pirates found him on his ship.

characters.name: Seagull Guns Nozdon
characters.short_bio: Seagull Guns Nozdon is a former member of the Roger Pirates.

characters.name: Kurozumi Semimaru

devil_fruit.name: Fruit of the Barrier
devil_fruit.power: Enables its user to generate almost invisible barriers to deflect or block any attack. These barriers can take on a wide range of shapes (racket, stairs, etc.).

characters.short_bio: Kurozumi Semimaru was a member of the Kurozumi Family and a major supporter of Kurozumi Orochi.

characters.name: Sharinguru

devil_fruit.name: Fruit of the Wheels
devil_fruit.power: Allows its owner to transform body parts into wheels and spin them at high speed.

characters.short_bio: Captain Sharinguru is a Marine captain who helped in the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.

devil_fruit.name: Sheep SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a sheep.

characters.name: Shelly
characters.short_bio: Shelly is Tonjit's hooorse and an animal of Long Ring Long Land.

characters.name: Shuraiya Bascùd
characters.short_bio: "Pirate Executioner" Shuraiya Bascùd is a bounty hunter, dedicated to chasing down the pirate Gasparde to avenge the deaths of his parents and sister. He is a central character in the fourth One Piece movie.

characters.name: Skunk One
characters.short_bio: Skunk One is one of the Trump Siblings pirates who appeared in the second movie as one of the major antagonists.

characters.name: Sleepy
characters.short_bio: Sleepy is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

characters.name: Solitaire

devil_fruit.name: Monkey SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a monkey.

characters.short_bio: Solitaire is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country.

characters.name: Spencer
characters.short_bio: Spencer was a member of the Roger Pirates and their intelligence officer until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: T Bone
characters.short_bio: "Ship Cutter" T Bone was a Marine Vice Admiral. As a Marine Captain two years ago, he was a minor antagonist during the Water 7 Arc and confronted the Straw Hat Pirates on the Sea Train route to Enies Lobby. Prior to joining the Marines, he was a royal knight. Sometime around the Egghead Arc, T Bone was killed in the Pepe Kingdom for the bounty he received from the Cross Guild.

characters.name: Tanaka

devil_fruit.name: Passe-Muraille fruit
devil_fruit.power: This fruit allows its user to pass through solid objects to escape or pass through walls.

characters.short_bio: Tanaka-san is the security guard of Gran Tesoro and an executive member of Gild Tesoro's crew. He appeared in One Piece Film: Gold as well as its filler arc and TV special.

characters.name: Taro
characters.short_bio: Taro was a member of the Roger Pirates.

devil_fruit.name: Armadillo SMILE
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into an armadillo.

characters.name: Tenjo-Sagari

devil_fruit.name: SMILE of the white snake
devil_fruit.power: it transforms you into a white snake.

characters.short_bio: Tenjo-Sagari is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria.

characters.name: Tobio
characters.short_bio: Tobio is the grandson of Ganzo. He serves as a supporting character in One Piece: The Movie.

characters.name: Toma
characters.short_bio: Toma is a young, kindhearted Marine swordsman and subordinate of Saga. He appeared in the fifth One Piece movie.

characters.name: Tsunagoro
characters.rank: head of a yakuza clan in the Hakumai region
characters.short_bio: "Broken Hat" Tsunagoro is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Hakumai region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.

characters.name: Tsurujo
characters.short_bio: Tsurujo, commonly known as O-Tsuru, is a tea house owner who lives in the Kuri region in Wano Country. She is also the wife of Kin'emon.

characters.name: Vitan
characters.short_bio: Vitan is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Wanyudo
characters.short_bio: Wanyudo is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, serving as Black Maria's weapon.

characters.name: Wetton
characters.short_bio: Wetton is the main antagonist of the anime-only Ruluka Island Arc. He was captain of the Wetton Pirates before becoming the mayor of Ruluka Island.

characters.name: Woonan
characters.short_bio: Woonan was an East Blue-born pirate captain renowned as "The Great Gold Pirate" for his plunder. He was also a childhood friend of the oden chef Ganzo. He serves, posthumously, as a supporting character in One Piece: The Movie.

characters.name: Xiao
characters.short_bio: Xiao is a character who appears in the tenth One Piece movie. She is Ever's little sister.

characters.name: Yamon
characters.short_bio: Yamon was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.name: Shimotsuki Yasuie
characters.short_bio: Shimotsuki Yasuie, also known as "Yasu the Hedgehog", Tonoyasu, or just Yasu, was a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a taikomochi who lived in Ebisu Town near the capital of Wano Country. He was the adoptive father of Toko. Back when the Kouzuki Family ruled over Wano Country, Yasuie served as the daimyo of Hakumai. Twenty years after Kurozumi Orochi's takeover of Wano, Yasuie sacrificed himself in an effort to mislead the shogun's forces and enable Kouzuki Momonosuke's revolution to continue.

characters.name: Yokozuna
characters.short_bio: Yokozuna is a Sumo Frog that Tom's Workers kept as a pet, friend and mascot up until Tom's execution. He is a supporting character throughout the Water 7 Saga.

characters.name: Zala

devil_fruit.name: Sea Urchin Fruit
devil_fruit.power: Allows you to transform any part of your body (even your hair) into spikes strong enough to pierce stone walls. These spikes can also be used to perform acupuncture techniques to increase the user's own muscle mass.

characters.short_bio: "Poison Spider" Zala, better known by her alias Miss Doublefinger, was the second highest ranking female officer agent in the secret organization known as Baroque Works. As an officer agent, she was partnered with Mr. 1. She also used the alias of Paula while she acted as the owner of Spiders Cafe in Arabasta. She was a major antagonist during the Arabasta Arc. After the group's dissolution, she went back to being the owner of the New Spiders Cafe alongside most of her Baroque Works colleagues.

characters.name: Zanki
characters.short_bio: Zanki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "three".

characters.name: Zenny
characters.short_bio: Zenny, also known as Zenny the Money Lender, is an old man from Goat Island. He is a debt collector who got stuck for 20 years on an island which was full of goats. He is suffering from a fatal disease, though he received medicine from Chopper. He had a childhood dream of becoming a pirate and decided, even though he was old, to sail the sea with the goats that he had trained to obey him. He seems to be very happy to have gotten the chance to fulfill his dream, thanks to the Straw Hat Pirates. He is the main ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Goat Island Arc.

characters.name: Zodia
characters.short_bio: Zodia is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

characters.name: Zucca
characters.short_bio: Zucca is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.

characters.name: Zunesha
characters.short_bio: Zunesha is a Naitamie-Norida elephant that was affiliated with Joy Boy 800 years ago. It now wanders through the New World and carries the island of Zou on its back as punishment for an unspecified crime it committed in the past.

characters.name: Batchee
characters.short_bio: Batchee is a fly that Fullbody put in his soup to try to humiliate Sanji.

characters.name: Buckingham Stussy
characters.short_bio: Miss Buckingham Stussy, also known by her alias Miss Buckin, is a former member of both the Rocks Pirates and the illegal science institute MADS. She is the self-proclaimed lover of the deceased Emperor Edward Newgate and the mother of Edward Weevil, a former Warlord of the Sea. During her time with MADS, she worked alongside other notable scientists like Dr. Vegapunk, Caesar Clown, Queen, and Vinsmoke Judge, though it has been stated that she was a freeloader who simply took and benefited from their research, hardly contributing anything of her own. Nonetheless, the group did manage to successfully produce a clone of her, Stussy, who is under the employment of Vegapunk.

characters.name: Carmel
characters.short_bio: Mother Carmel was a child trafficker dealing in orphans, that operated in the Underworld several decades ago, under the code name of "Mountain Witch". Running an orphanage known as the "Sheep's House", her seemingly benevolent nature caused her to be known as the "Holy Mother". In reality, she sold her orphan wards to the World Government every two years to be trained as Marines or Cipher Pol agents, until she met her end 62 years ago. Notably, she took care of a young Charlotte Linlin, who would later go on to become the Emperor Big Mom.

characters.name: Clou D. Clover
characters.short_bio: Clou D. Clover, commonly known as Professor Clover, was the director of the Ohara Library, and a leading authority on archaeology. He was a professor and archaeologist who studied Poneglyphs with his fellow colleagues in the Tree of Knowledge. During his younger years, he was also an infamous explorer known for getting repeatedly caught by the Marines. Clover and his fellow archaeologists died 22 years ago for conducting forbidden research on the Void Century, which led the World Government to decimate the island of Ohara through a Buster Call.

characters.name: Donquixote Mjosgard
characters.short_bio: Saint Donquixote Mjosgard was a World Noble and member of the Donquixote Family, one of the 20 royal families that founded the World Government. After an attempt to recapture his freed fish-man slaves went awry, Mjosgard met Queen Otohime of Fish-Man Island's Ryugu Kingdom and became their ally and a supporter of their efforts to integrate with humans, opposing the extreme racism typically associated with the World Nobles' normal ideology. During the most recent Levely, he would directly oppose other World Nobles from threatening Otohime's family, which resulted in his execution.

characters.name: Fugetsu Omusubi
characters.short_bio: Fugetsu Omusubi was a samurai who, as a member of the Fugetsu Family, served as the daimyo of the Kibi region until he was imprisoned and killed by Kaidou 20 years ago.

characters.name: Ginny
characters.short_bio: Ginny was the former East Army commander of the Revolutionary Army, having joined the group alongside Bartholomew Kuma 22 years ago, back when they were known as the Freedom Fighters. She was the mother of Jewelry Bonney. She was previously a slave from the Porco Kingdom who was forced to take part in the Native Hunting Competition on God Valley 38 years ago. She and Emporio Ivankov were responsible for orchestrating the God Valley Incident as a means of escaping the Native Hunting Competition. She was captured by the World Government and became the eighth wife to a World Noble. She was also one of Jaygarcia Saturn's test subjects and developed the Sapphire Scales disease after a failed experiment. Ginny was then released from slavery and used the little time remaining to her to return to the Sorbet Kingdom with her child, dying as a result.

characters.name: Guernika
characters.short_bio: Guernika was a masked agent of CP0. While in Wano Country for negotiations with Shogun Kurozumi Orochi, Guernika played a crucial role in the Raid on Onigashima. On the World Government's order, he interfered in the duel between Kaidou and Monkey D. Luffy, resulting in the latter's temporary loss, for which he was murdered by Kaidou as punishment. Due to his actions and role, he was a supporting antagonist during the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Hera
characters.short_bio: Hera the Thundercloud is a thundercloud homie created by Big Mom at Wano Country as a replacement for Zeus. She is a special kind of homie, having received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons, alongside Prometheus and Napoleon.

characters.name: Jorul
characters.short_bio: "Waterfall Beard" Jorul was a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, along with Jarul. He was known as a hero of the giants and one of the world's oldest warriors. 63 years ago, Jorul was mortally wounded during an attempt to stop a young, rampaging Charlotte Linlin, leading to his eventual death soon after.

characters.name: Kaidou
characters.short_bio: Kaidou of the Beasts, renowned as the world's "Strongest Creature", is the Governor-General of the Beasts Pirates and was formerly one of the Four Emperors who ruled over the New World. He is also the father of Yamato. Once a child soldier in the service of the Vodka Kingdom, Kaidou joined the legendary Rocks Pirates as an apprentice in his teenage years. A few years after the God Valley Incident, he formed his own pirate crew and built it up into a powerful military force determined to challenge the World Government and change the world. Kaidou then joined forces with Wano Country's shogun Kurozumi Orochi and occupied Onigashima as his base for nearly three decades. In the present day, Kaidou formed an unprecedented pirate alliance with fellow Emperor and former crewmate Big Mom for the purpose of taking over the world. He then betrayed Orochi to enact his New Onigashima Project for Wano. The plan never came to fruition, however, as Onigashima was raided by the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance on that very same night and Kaidou was ultimately bested by Monkey D. Luffy. Following this defeat, Kaidou lost his position among the Four Emperors. Kaidou was first referred to by Monkey D. Garp in the Post-Enies Lobby Arc when he revealed the existence of the Four Emperors, and was then first directly mentioned by Gecko Moria in the Thriller Bark Arc. Before he debuted in person, his voice was heard in a flashback that Kouzuki Momonosuke had when first disembarking on Dressrosa. Due to his actions, he can be considered the overarching antagonist of the Dressrosa Saga, the main antagonist of the Wano Country Arc and Saga, and a major antagonist of the second half of the series.

characters.name: Kalgara
characters.short_bio: Kalgara was a warrior of the Shandia who lived on Jaya around 400 years ago. He was renowned among his people as the "Great Warrior of Shandora" and feared as the "Demon of Shandora" by outsiders. During his life, he befriended the later infamous explorer Mont Blanc Noland, and the two promised to meet again. However, both men met tragic ends before this promise could be fulfilled. Kalgara died in battle against the Skypiean forces after a part of Jaya was sent to the sky by the Knock Up Stream. Until his final moments, he regretted being unable to ring the Golden Bell to signal their presence to Noland. His legacy lived on after his death, as a statue of him was erected in the Hidden Cloud Village. His bloodline also continued through his daughter Mousse, and Wyper is his descendant.

characters.name: Kashii
characters.short_bio: Kashii, together with Oimo, was one of the two giants who guarded the front gate of Enies Lobby for over fifty years until he and Oimo realized they were tricked by the World Government. He is a member of the Giant Warrior Pirates. He and Oimo became major allies to the Straw Hat Pirates during the Enies Lobby Arc and Egghead Arc.

characters.name: Kingbaum
characters.short_bio: Kingbaum is a tree homie, a member of the Big Mom Pirates, and the master of the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island. However, he was forced to serve the Straw Hat Pirates due to them possessing Charlotte Linlin's Vivre Card.

characters.name: Kurozumi Orochi
characters.short_bio: Kurozumi Orochi was the former shogun of Wano Country and one of the last members of the Kurozumi Family. Persecuted in his youth due to his grandfather's failed attempt to seize the shogunate from the Kouzuki Family, Orochi encountered some relatives who helped him formulate another attempt to become shogun. This plan succeeded, with Orochi deposing the Kouzuki Family around three decades before the present day after allying with Kaidou of the Four Emperors. Orochi ruled Wano tyrannically until he was deposed by none other than Kaidou, who betrayed him to seize Wano for himself; Orochi survived Kaidou's attack and tried to kill everyone on Onigashima out of spite but was then killed after two encounters with the Kouzuki Family's Nine Red Scabbards who he knew had been prophesied to overthrow him. Due to his actions and role, he is the secondary antagonist of the first half and a supporting antagonist in the second half of the Wano Country Arc, and one of the major antagonists of the Wano Country Saga overall.

characters.name: Kurozumi Tama
characters.short_bio: Kurozumi Tama, commonly known as O-Tama, is a girl from the region of Kuri in Wano Country. She is a kasa weaver working under Tenguyama Hitetsu, as well as a kunoichi in training under the apprenticeship of Shinobu. She is the last known survivor of the Kurozumi Family. Tama befriended Portgas D. Ace four years ago, having wished to join his crew at the time. She is a major ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance during the Wano Country Arc.

characters.name: Minoruba
characters.short_bio: Minoruba is a bounty hunter on Sabaody Archipelago.

characters.name: Momoo
characters.short_bio: Momoo is a giant sea cow from the Grand Line, and the first Sea Beast seen in the series. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly". Originally, he was utilized by the Arlong Pirates as a method of intimidation towards the residents of the Conomi Islands. After Arlong's defeat, he was captured and briefly employed as a draft animal by the Caribou Pirates.

characters.name: Pandawomanmi
characters.short_bio: Pandawomanmi is the female version of Pandaman. She first appeared in the Amazon Lily Arc where Pandaman would not be allowed (as men are forbidden on Amazon Lily).

characters.name: Porchemy
characters.short_bio: Porchemy was a member of the Bluejam Pirates until he was killed by his captain Bluejam for losing to Ace and Sabo.

characters.name: Raizo
characters.short_bio: Raizo of the Mist is a ninja from Wano Country and one of the Nine Red Scabbards who served as Kouzuki Oden's retainers. He was born 55 years ago, but traveled 20 years forward in time at the age of 35. Following Kouzuki Momonosuke's ascent to shogun, he serves as the daimyo of Udon. He acts as a major ally to the Straw Hat Pirates during the Zou and Wano Country Arcs.

characters.name: Shimotsuki Kuina
characters.short_bio: Shimotsuki Kuina was a childhood friend, relative and rival of Roronoa Zoro. She was the daughter of Shimotsuki Koushirou and the granddaughter of Shimotsuki Kouzaburou making her a descendant of Wano Country's famed Shimotsuki Family. Her death at the age of eleven drove much of Zoro's ambitions as a swordsman, including his development of the Three Sword Style.

characters.name: Shimotsuki Ryuma
characters.short_bio: Shimotsuki Ryuma was a legendary, world-famous samurai hailing from the Shimotsuki Family of Wano Country, who lived during Wano's "Country of Gold" era centuries ago. He was revered for his mastery of swordsmanship that earned him the title Sword God, as well as his feat of slaying a dragon. He is the direct ancestor of Shimotsuki Ushimaru and Roronoa Zoro. 23 years before the current storyline, Ryuma's consecrated grave in Ringo was ransacked and both his corpse and sword, Shusui were stolen by Gecko Moria. Eventually, his corpse was reanimated by Brook's shadow and turned into a zombie to serve Moria on Thriller Bark, until it was destroyed by Zoro himself in a sword duel while his sword was eventually returned to his grave. He is the same Ryuma from Oda's one-shot Monsters and its anime adaptation, Monsters: 103 Mercies Dragon Damnation.

characters.name: Shimotsuki Ushimaru
characters.short_bio: Shimotsuki Ushimaru was a member of the Shimotsuki Family, and the last daimyo of Ringo in Wano Country before the takeover of Kurozumi Orochi as shogun 20 years ago. He was a direct descendant of the legendary samurai Shimotsuki Ryuma and the great-uncle of Roronoa Zoro through his older sister Furiko. After failing to depose Orochi, Ushimaru abandoned his name in shame and referred to himself as . Alongside fellow daimyo Fugetsu Omusubi and Uzuki Tempura, he helped inspire a young Yamato, the son of their nemesis Kaidou, to pursue his dream of becoming Kouzuki Oden.

characters.name: Shiryu
characters.short_bio: Shiryu of the Rain is one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, severing as the captain of the second ship of the fleet. He was originally introduced as the ex-Head Jailer of Impel Down, who had himself been imprisoned on Level 6 death row for his excessive, murderous violence against prisoners. When temporarily released to help Magellan quell the prison riot caused by Monkey D. Luffy and Marshall D. Teach coming to Impel Down, he chose to go against what he was ordered and instead assist the Blackbeard Pirates, ultimately deciding to join them. Due to his actions and role, he is a supporting antagonist in the Impel Down and Marineford Arcs, a minor antagonist in the Egghead Arc, and a major antagonist in the Final Saga.

characters.name: Toko
characters.short_bio: Toko is a girl who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country and is under the care of Kouzuki Hiyori. She is the adopted daughter of the late former daimyo of Hakumai, Shimotsuki Yasuie, and thus a member of the Shimotsuki Family. She worked as a kamuro for Hiyori, who was living as the courtesan "Komurasaki", until Toko angered Shogun Kurozumi Orochi and was driven out of the Flower Capital. After the Beasts Pirates' fall from power and Orochi's death, she returned to live in the Flower Capital with Hiyori.

characters.name: Tsukimi
characters.short_bio: Dr. Tsukimi was an old man who appeared in Enel's cover story.

characters.name: Uta
characters.short_bio: Uta is a world-famous Emperor Red-Haired Shanks, being a musician in his crew. In the filler Uta's Past Arc, she met and befriended Monkey D. Luffy in Foosha Village when they were both children. Left behind on Elegia by the Red Hair Pirates to become a singer, Uta trained under the guardianship of the island's former king Gordon for ten years. She then rapidly rose to worldwide success over the last two years, but after coming to learn of the suffering pirates had inflicted on her fans, she concocted a plan to end the Great Pirate Era and create a "New Genesis" where everyone would live in peace in her "Uta World" for eternity. After facing resistance to this plan, Uta ended up summoning the demonic entity Tot Musica, which was defeated by an alliance led by Luffy and Shanks. Remorseful at her actions, Uta rejected a life-saving medicine in order to return everyone from Uta World, leaving her status unknown. She is the main antagonist of One Piece Film: Red.

characters.name: Uzuki Tempura
characters.short_bio: Uzuki Tempura was a samurai who, as a member of the Uzuki Family, served as the daimyo of the Udon region until he was imprisoned and killed by Kaidou 20 years ago.
